projects.title: Jesus reigns bukidnon 2022
projects.desc: It is a time to bring honor and praise by testifying the Lord's powerful work in their province and give Glory to God.

projects.title: Mindanao youth Congress 2022
projects.desc: The Mindanao Youth Congress is a gathering of young people from across the region, brought together by a shared passion for serving the Lord and making a positive impact in their communities.

projects.title: El and Abi's wedding
projects.desc: El and Abi's wedding was a magical celebration of love and commitment. The ceremony was held outdoors under a beautiful arch adorned with flowers and greenery, and the couple exchanged heartfelt vows that left not a dry eye in the house.

projects.title: NCMDC representative for national poetry 2021
projects.desc: As the NCMDC representative for national poetry 2021, I promoted poetry on a national scale with fellow poets, making a positive impact in the community and glorifying God.

projects.title: Mothers day entry 2020
projects.desc: Through poetry, I seek to honor the immeasurable love and selflessness of all mothers. With heartfelt and poignant words, I aim to unite readers from all walks of life with a deep appreciation for the women who shape and inspire us, bringing us together in a powerful bond of gratitude and admiration.

projects.title: Youth Alive national spoken poetry competition 2020
projects.desc: The Youth Alive national spoken poetry competition 2020 brought together talented young poets from across the country, who showcased their passion and artistry through powerful words and captivating performances, leaving a lasting impact on their audience.

projects.title: Kalig-on 2023
projects.desc: Kalig-on 2023 is a charity concert featuring talented performers showcasing their skills for the glory of the Lord. The event aims to raise funds for a charitable cause while also celebrating faith and sharing the message of hope and love with the audience.
